tasks.title: Create GitHub Repository No-Smoke/tm-skill-test
tasks.description: Initialize GitHub repository at No-Smoke/tm-skill-test via MCP to validate repository creation workflow.
tasks.details: Use MCP (assumed project initiator tool) to create repository 'tm-skill-test' under No-Smoke organization. Add initial README.md with project overview. Configure repository settings for Issues and Actions. Verify repository exists and is accessible.
tasks.testStrategy: Check GitHub UI: confirm repo exists at No-Smoke/tm-skill-test, README present, Issues enabled, Actions enabled. Clone repo locally to verify access.

tasks.title: Deploy GitHub Actions Workflow for Task Sync
tasks.description: Create .github/workflows/task-sync.yml to sync Task Master tasks to GitHub Issues bidirectionally.
tasks.details: Create workflow file in .github/workflows/ with triggers on push, schedule (cron for status sync), and repository_dispatch. Use actions/checkout@v4, setup-node@v4. Implement taskâ†’issue creation on Task Master task init, status propagation via API polling or webhooks. Use GitHub API to create/update issues with task metadata. Pin actions to SHAs per best practices.
tasks.testStrategy: Push workflow file, trigger workflow manually via dispatch event. Verify workflow runs successfully in Actions tab, no syntax errors, jobs complete.

tasks.title: Initialize Task Master with Test Tasks
tasks.description: Set up Task Master in project with 3+ sample tasks to test sync functionality.
tasks.details: Initialize Task Master config file (tm.json or equivalent). Create 3+ tasks covering different statuses (pending, in-progress, done). Include task metadata for GitHub issue titles, descriptions, labels. Ensure tasks have IDs and status fields for sync testing.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify Task Master init completes, 3+ tasks listed in Task Master UI/CLI. Check task JSON structure has required fields (id, title, status, description).

tasks.title: Validate Task Master to GitHub Issues Sync
tasks.description: Test automatic creation of GitHub Issues from Task Master tasks and status propagation.
tasks.details: Trigger Task Master task creation/update. Workflow should: 1) Poll Task Master tasks via API/file watch, 2) Create corresponding GitHub Issues with matching title/description/labels, 3) Update issue status/labels on Task Master status changes. Implement idempotency to avoid duplicates using task IDs.
tasks.testStrategy: Create/update Task Master tasks, verify corresponding Issues appear in GitHub with correct details. Change task status, confirm issue updates (labels, assignees, state). Check for duplicates or missed syncs.

tasks.title: Configure OpenProject Integration and Qdrant Storage
tasks.description: Set up OpenProject project with tm-op-sync and verify Qdrant metadata storage.
tasks.details: Create OpenProject project via API/UI. Configure tm-op-sync tool for bidirectional sync between Task Master/GitHub Issues and OpenProject work packages. Initialize Qdrant vector DB instance, store task metadata (embeddings, sync status). Set up Nextcloud folder structure if required for file-based sync.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify OpenProject project created with work packages matching tasks/issues. Check tm-op-sync logs for successful syncs. Query Qdrant to confirm metadata stored. Test status propagation across all three systems.
